title: Social Media Manager
job_overview:
Are you a creative powerhouse with a passion for digital marketing and a talent for turning ideas into viral content?

We're looking for a Social Media Manager who not only understands the digital landscape but knows how to dominate it. If you're strategic, innovative, and results-driven, we want you on our team.

What You’ll Do:
Develop and execute impactful social media strategies

Plan, schedule, and optimize content across multiple platforms

Run high-performing Meta (Facebook & Instagram) ad campaigns

Utilize AI tools to boost creativity and streamline workflow

Analyze metrics and continuously refine strategies for growth

Manage multiple projects and meet deadlines efficiently

What We’re Looking For:
Proven experience with Meta Ads Manager

Strong grasp of content strategy and performance marketing

Creative, original thinker with engaging content ideas

Familiar with AI tools (e.g. for content, scheduling, or design)

Highly organized, detail-oriented, and deadline-driven

Able to provide a portfolio or samples of previous work

Bonus Points If You:
Have experience managing multiple brands/accounts

Stay on top of the latest social media trends and tools

What You’ll Get:
A collaborative, creative, and supportive team environment

Opportunities for growth with a forward-thinking company

A space to bring ideas to life and make a real impact

Ready to join us?
